extendedInfo.description: Track your kids 24x7 so you know they are safe. Make sure they got on the bus, got to school, and arrived back home. See it all in REAL-TIME with the highest available ACCURACYThis is the one MUST-HAVE app for your new Android Phone.DroidTracker Pro is the simplest, most powerful mobile tracking application for your Android mobile device. Your device is an asset that deserves protection. In addition, our professional strength set of tools allows you to do so much more! DroidTracker Pro offers all this and a power management system that manages your battery life better than any other app like this in the market.***IMPORTANT NOTE: YOU MUST INSTALL THE APP DIRECTLY ON YOUR PHONE AND RUN IT ONCE TO REGISTER IT.  THIS IS CURRENTLY THE ONLY WAY TO ACTIVATE THIS VERY POWERFUL APPWith DroidTracker Pro you can:Locate where your Android device is in real time using a high resolution map viewable on any web browser.Track where your device has been during the last 4 hours.COMING SOON IN OUR "EXTREME" VERSION OF THE PRODUCT (upgrade pricing TBD):Track where your device has been for ANY period of time and display its path on a high resolution map. You define the period of time to track your device and just click and see it.Operate your device from anywhere. Send an SMS text from any other cell phone to operate your Android from afar - sound an alarm, take pictures or video, or have the phone call you to listen to whatâs going on in the vicinity of your Android. You can even lock or wipe your device.Hundreds Of Usesâ¦.â¢	Find your lost phoneâ¢	Track where your children are and where theyâve beenâ¢	Business Owners, Sales Manages, Dispatchers â track your employees in real time and report on their historical movementsâ¢	Track your loved ones to keep them safe.â¢	Runners and bikers - track your route, distance and timesIf you can dream it, you can track it with DroidTracker Pro!UNLIMITED USAGE â NO ADDITIONAL FEESâ¦..EVER:How it works:DroidTracker Pro has two key elements:(1)An app which is downloaded to your Android mobile device from the Android Marketplace which allows it to send and receive signals to our secure server and(2) A web interface from our Customer Portal that you sign on with an ID and password to locate the phone and track where itâs been. You choose the period of time you want to track and it will be displayed on a high resolution map.WE LISTEN! DroidVentures' high performance products are born from input from our users and fans. We listen to what you need and translate those needs into professional strength mobile solutions.We are committed to:â¢	Integrity â We say what do and we do what we sayâ¦itâs that simple!â¢	Excellence â Our apps come to market fully tested by real users like you so our products perform to not just meet but exceed your expectations.â¢	Inspiration â Our products are solutions-based but also seek to inspire our users to find new and different ways to use them to enhance and empower their lives. â¢	Customer support â call or email us with your issues, problems, suggestions and ideas. We will respond because we treat our customers like partners. Without our partners we have no company!

reviews.comment: Super easy to use! Works great for tracking your teenage kids and keeping them honest. Simple UI, reliable operation.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best App Ever
reviews.comment: Great app to find your lost phone or track kids or elderly family members. Easy to use and helped me find my lost phone on more than one occasion.  Well worth the price compared the cost of a replacing a lost phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: When any of the coming soon features work, it\'s worth money. Until then, there are a hundred free apps that do the same thing. Refunded.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A must have for every family
reviews.comment: If Gail Palmgreen had a smart phone and this app, her husband would never have been questioned by the police about his wife who went missing for 8 momths. They found her dead and her wrecked Jeep off the side of a mountain road from an apparent accident after 8 months of searching for her. True story, google her name. Now my wife and I both have this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It is the only application that the tracking page works, had to reset phone, emailed support and got account reset overnight, very happy with the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is by far the best app of its kind on the market. Easy to set up and use, and it works perfectly!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Right back to number ONE!!! I only wish the icon would pop up from time to time to show its running instead of full-time. Dev is cool too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No good bought it for nothing wast of money and time. Never even got to see the map
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pff
reviews.comment: Isn\'t worth the money until feartures are added. It puts a notification in top bar and also doesn\'t auto start at boot. First day I put this on the kids phone they disabled it buy either closing it or just rebooting there phone. What\'s the point in tracking them if they know I\'m doing it!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app sucks and it does nothing they say it does
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is deceptive and they are deceptive in the way they present it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not impressed, app is too easy to remove or turn off. Waste of money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only gave a block radius of where the phone actually was, UNHELPFUL
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is unbelievable! Definately the best app on the market. Already helped me find my phone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t update location unless you play with the app - sucks not worth the money
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Uses too much battery. But seems to track very well. Droid 2
reviews.author: A Google User
